TextBlock.Text: CASSAVA: I have traveled here to use the sunless day as a control experiment for my study today.
CASSAVA: As I hoped, the deadly matter at this site behaves in line with the properties observed on <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth.</color>
CASSAVA: But with this success, I am confident I have found a second property of this mysterious and deadly matter.
CASSAVA: With only one sample of data, I could not confirm it was not an external factor that caused the observations on <color=lightblue>Timber Hearth.</color>
